definition: To successfully overcome a difficult situation, obstacle, or challenge, often requiring determination, perseverance, and mental or physical effort. It is commonly used to describe the act of surpassing personal limitations, conquering fears, or resolving conflicts.

examples.german: Er hat seine Schüchternheit überwunden und ist jetzt selbstbewusster.
examples.english: He has overcome his shyness and is now more confident.

examples.german: Sie konnte ihre Krankheit erfolgreich überwinden.
examples.english: She was able to successfully overcome her illness.

examples.german: Es war schwierig, die Sprachbarriere zu überwinden.
examples.english: It was difficult to overcome the language barrier.

examples.german: Wir müssen unsere Unterschiede überwinden und zusammenarbeiten.
examples.english: We need to overcome our differences and work together.
